Package javanews.gui.internalframe

Provides the bulk of user interaction windows for the application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
COMConfig This class is used to display an instance of JInternalFrame within the JavaNews GUI.
COMPortClient Represents and displays a monitoring thread for a specific COM port given a set of compatible parameters.
GenericFrame Used for displaying the results of SQL queries from the database.
Help_About Responsible for providing information about the application and the environment in which it runs.
Help_Licensing Responsible for providing information about the licensing terms of the application.
Help_Using Responsible for providing an overview of help topic available to the user about the application.
LinkChart Responsible for displaying information about the number of circuits and their state as well as historical changes to availability of links.
LinkDetail This class is responsible for providing detailed information on a specific link.
MessageDetail This class is responsible for providing detailed information on a specific link.
RawDataWindow This class can be attached to a displayed instance of COMPortClient and is used to display messages received by the application.
 

Package javanews.gui.internalframe Description

Provides the bulk of user interaction windows for the application. All of the classes within this package extend the javax.swing.JInternalFrame class and are intended for use within the JDesktopPane provided by the Client class that can be found within the parent package.

Package Specification

None

Related Documentation

None

Since:
1.0
See Also:
JDesktopPane, JInternalFrame
